statements: DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE city='New York';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE avg_speed > 50 AND vehicle_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM traffic_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 100 AND traffic_congestion = 'Heavy';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'City Center'
DELETE FROM traffic_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-25' AND traffic_congestion = 'Heavy'
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 10 AND location = 'Highway 101';
DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE type = 'Accident' AND location = 'Highway A';
